http://www.pcre.org/

The latest release of the PCRE library is 8.02. You can download it from its official home via anonymous FTP:

    * ftp://ftp.csx.cam.ac.uk/pub/software/programming/pcre/

You can also download via HTTP from the mirror at SourceForge.net:

    * http://sourceforge.net/projects/pcre/files/
